site_name: CHURCH OF THE ASCENSION, ASCENSION VICARAGE, THORNHILL AVENUE, PLUMSTEAD, LONDON, SE18 2HS
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission dated 09/08/2022 (Reference: 22/1685/MA) for 'Demolition of the existing vicarage building and the construction of a new residential development comprising: 2 x 4-bed houses, 2 x 3-bed houses and 1 x 2-bed flat with associated parking, cycle storage, refuse and external alterations.'ÿto allow for:ÿ- Variation of Condition 2 (Drawings and Plans) including:ÿOverall building footprint adjusted to the as-constructed location including moving the building forwardsAmendments to the footprint of unit 4 including the infill of the corner section and increased to the rearAmendments to roof detailingIncreased garden sizesAmendments to parking layout and access off Ancaster StreetInternal floor levels increased within unit 4Increase in ridge and eaves height of main buildingAdditional windows to the ground floor of unit 3 and first floor of unit 2Amendment to bin store locationRemoval of car parking space to unit 4(Reconsultation)(Amended Plans and description)
